name: fego
description: 基于 React 的web开发库
author: esky asyxu

scripts.build-www: npm run build-desk && npm run build-mob
scripts.build-desk: rm -rf ./www/build/desktop && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es webpack --progress --config www/config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build-mob: rm -rf ./www/build/mobile && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es webpack --progress --config www/config/webpack.mob.config.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:commonjs: rm -rf lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --copy-files && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:es: rm -rf es &&cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --copy-files && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es
